name: Slaughter-Priest of Mogis
originalText:
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Slaughter-Priest of Mogis gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice another creature or an enchantment: Slaughter-Priest of Mogis gains first strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: The first ability of Slaughter-Priest of Mogis is a triggered ability, not an activated ability. It doesn’t allow you to sacrifice a permanent whenever you want; rather, you need some other way of sacrificing permanents, such as its second ability.
Multiple instances of first strike on the same creature are redundant.
